summary:
**Additional Actions**

* Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
Here is a summarized version of the Security Council document:

**Annex II: Asset Freeze**

The following individuals are subject to an asset freeze:

1. Aisha Muammar Qadhafi (daughter of Muammar Qadhafi)
2. Hannibal Muammar Qadhafi (son of Muammar Qadhafi)
3. Khamis Muammar Qadhafi (son of Muammar Qadhafi)
4. Muammar Mohammed Abu Minyar Qadhafi (Leader of the Revolution, Supreme Commander of Armed Forces)
5. Mutassim Qadhafi (National Security Adviser, son of Muammar Qadhafi)
6. Saif al-Islam Qadhafi (Director, Qadhafi Foundation, son of Muammar Qadhafi)

**Previous Section: Travel Ban and Asset Freeze**

The following individuals are subject to a travel ban and asset freeze:

1. Mohammed Muammar Qadhafi (son of Muammar Qadhafi)
2. Muammar Mohammed Abu Minyar Qadhafi (Leader of the Revolution, Supreme Commander of Armed Forces)
3. Mutassim Qadhafi (National Security Adviser, son of Muammar Qadhafi)
4. Saadi Qadhafi (Commander Special Forces, son of Muammar Qadhafi)
5. Saif al-Arab Qadhafi (son of Muammar Qadhafi)
6. Saif al-Islam Qadhafi (Director, Qadhafi Foundation, son of Muammar Qadhafi)
7. Colonel Abdullah Al-Senussi (Director Military Intelligence)
